description.p: Defines the space between the top of the frame and the object above it.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Spacing above]* property can be used to increase the amout of space between the top of the frame and the item above it, such as another control or the top of the screen. Spacing is defined using CSS syntax. For example, 2in or 20px.
